00026 class XJournal;

00028 
00029 class XScalarEntry : public XNode
00030 {
00031     XNODE_OBJECT
00032 protected:
00033     XScalarEntry(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver,
00034                  const char *format = 0L);
00035 public:
00036     virtual ~XScalarEntry() {}
00037 
00038     //a criterion that determine a trigger of storing
00039     //0: never
00040     //negative: allways
00041     //positive: when the difference from old value exceeds 'Delta'
00042     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &delta() const {return m_delta;}
00043     //if false, one line does't contain this
00044     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &store() const {return m_store;}
00045 
00046     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &value() const {return m_value;}
00047     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &storedValue() const {return m_storedValue;}
00048   
00049     bool isTriggered() const;
00050     void storeValue();
00051 
00052     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver() const {return m_driver.lock();}
00053   
00054     virtual XString getLabel() const;
00055   
00056     virtual void value(double val);
00057 protected:
00058 private:
00059     const weak_ptr<XDriver> m_driver;
00060  
00061     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_delta;
00062     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> m_store;
00063 
00064     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_value;
00065     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_storedValue;
00066   
00067     bool m_bTriggered;
00068 };

00076 };

00120 class XValGraph : public XNode
00121 {
00122     XNODE_OBJECT
00123 protected:
00124     XValGraph(const char *name, bool runtime,
00125               const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &entries);
00126 public:
00127     virtual ~XValGraph() {}
00128 
00129     void showGraph();
00130     void clearAllPoints();
00131 
00132     typedef XItemNode<XScalarEntryList, XScalarEntry> tAxis;
00133   
00134     const shared_ptr<tAxis> &axisX() const {return m_axisX;}
00135     const shared_ptr<tAxis> &axisY1() const {return m_axisY1;}
00136     const shared_ptr<tAxis> &axisZ() const {return m_axisZ;}
00137 protected:
00138 private:
00139     shared_ptr<XGraph> m_graph;
00140     qshared_ptr<FrmGraph> m_graphForm;
00141 
00142     shared_ptr<tAxis> m_axisX, m_axisY1, m_axisZ;
00143     shared_ptr<XXYPlot> m_livePlot, m_storePlot;
00144     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnAxisChanged;
00145     void onAxisChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node);
00146 
00147     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnLiveChanged;
00148     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnStoreChanged;
00149     void onLiveChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node);
00150     void onStoreChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node);
00151 };

00153 class XGraphList : public XCustomTypeListNode<XValGraph>
00154 {
00155     XNODE_OBJECT
00156 protected:
00157     XGraphList(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &entries);
00158 public:
00159     virtual ~XGraphList() {}
00160 
00161     virtual shared_ptr<XNode> createByTypename(const XString &, const XString& name)  {
00162         return XNode::create<XValGraph>(name.c_str(), false, m_entries);
00163     }
00164 private:
00165     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> m_entries;
00166 };
